item.description:
Join us for the 2nd Annual Zumba for Autism Event Wednesday, May 22, 2013!

 

With more than 17 awesome instructors and their teams, plus a LIVE DJ, an amazing light show, cool raffle prizes (including tickets to the Jay Z and Justin Timberlake concert and Zumba cargo pants autographed by BETO!), the largest Zumbawear store in all of New England, a T-shirt cutting booth, on-site make-up artists, Hint Water, Cedar Foods, a picture taking station and more BIG SURPRISES this is sure to be the event of the year!

Best of all, 100% of the proceeds goes toward helping the children and families affected by autism!

 

WHEN: WEDNESDAY, MAY 22nd
WHERE: Melmark New England Grand Ballroom
461 River Rd. Andover, MA 01810

SCHEDULE:
6:30-7pm Registration & Raffles
7:00-9pm Zumba dancing and shenanigans!

DONATION:
$20 Pre-Paid (See below)
$25 WALK-IN

TWO EASY WAYS TO PRE-REGISTER:
1. At one of Amy's classes
2. Online at this link:
https:// melmarkne.ejoinme.org/MyEvents/EventDetailsInstructors/RegiserNow/tabid/443318/Default.aspx

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC!
PLEASE SPREAD THE WORD :)

More info at: www.amyfournier.com
or http://www.melmarkne.org/

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: The BIGGEST Event of the Year: The 2nd Annual Zumba for Autism Event!
